beats.text: We stand at an unprecedented moment in history. Solar and wind power have become the cheapest electricity sources globally, with costs plummeting 68% and 55% respectively since 2015. The renewable energy revolution is no longer a distant dream - it's happening right now, transforming how we power our world.
